name: PowerCenter:Use Shortcuts
description:
Folder should have at least a ratio number of shared objects/total number of transformation greater than X%.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Folders with number of shared objects/total Transformations ratio lower than X %.
It provides the following information
Folder full name, ratio value
rationale: For speed of development, maintainability and evolutivity management use shortcuts to reuse transformation.
remediation: Create shortcut on source, target and transformation objects and reuse them in other folders.
total: Total number of Folders, excluding Shared Folders
